# mode

**Instance Property**

The mode of the mapping operation to perform.

## Declaration

```swift
var mode: MTLSparseTextureMappingMode
```

## Discussion

When mode is [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLSparseTextureMappingMode/map], Metal walks the tiles in the region in X, Y, then Z order, assigning the next tile from the heap in increasing order, starting at [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4UpdateSparseTextureMappingOperation/heapOffset].

When mode is [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLSparseTextureMappingMode/unmap], Metal unmaps the tiles in the region, ignoring the contents of member [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4UpdateSparseTextureMappingOperation/heapOffset].
